WorkTypeCareSpecialty.name: WorkTypeCareSpecialty
WorkTypeCareSpecialty.description: Represents a relationship between a care specialty and a visit type (Work Type).

CareSpecialtyId.description: The care speciality associated with the work type.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time that the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time that the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the WorkTypeCareSpecialty record.

WorkTypeId.description: The work type that the specialty is associated with. This is the parent record of the work type care specialty.
